## ITaskInfo interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITaskInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height?](./teamsfx-api.itaskinfo.height.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Dialog height - either a number in pixels or default layout such as 'large', 'medium', or 'small' |
|  [title?](./teamsfx-api.itaskinfo.title.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Initial dialog title |
|  [url?](./teamsfx-api.itaskinfo.url.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Initial webview URL |
|  [width?](./teamsfx-api.itaskinfo.width.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Dialog width - either a number in pixels or default layout such as 'large', 'medium', or 'small' |
